FuncDef: This command enables the generation of the nas-port RADIUS attribute. You enter decimal representation of a 32-bit string that indicates your port information. This 32-bit string can be compiled based on different information from the port (data types). By using syntax number-of-bits data-type you indicate how many bits from the 32 bits are used for the specific data type. These data types can be combined up to 32 bits in total. In between the different data types 0's and/or 1's as bits can be added.
